unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Overlord
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Prophet of Hashut
unit.description: Magic: A Prophet of Hashut is a Level 4 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless, Daemonsmith.

unit.name: Bull Centaur Taurruk
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Fear.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Castellan
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Daemonsmith Sorcerer
unit.description: Magic: A Daemonsmith Sorcerer is a Level 2 wizard. Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless, Daemonsmith.

unit.name: Bull Centaur Bahal
unit.description: Equipment: Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Fear.

unit.name: Hobgoblin Khan
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Minions, Taskmaster, Greenskins.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Relentless, Block (shield).

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Annihilator
unit.description: Equipment: Blunderbuss and heavy armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Infernal Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Infernal Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Fireglaive and Chaos Armour. Special Rules: Relentless.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Infernal Ironsworn
unit.description: Equipment: Ensorcelled Weapon, Chaos Armour and shield. Special Rules: Relentless, Stubborn, Bodyguard.

unit.name: Chaos Dwarf Quarreller
unit.description: Equipment: Crossbow and heavy armour, Special Rules: Relentless

unit.name: Hobgoblin Warrior
unit.description: Equipment: Light armour and shield. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Anti-Cav (spear), Greenskins.

unit.name: Hobgoblin Sneaky Git
unit.description: Equipment: Additional hand weapons. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Cutthroats, Light Infantry, Poisoned Attacks (1), Greenskins.

unit.name: Hobgoblin Wolf Rider
unit.description: Mount: Wolf. Equipment: Light armour. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Light Cavalry, Greenskins.

unit.name: Bull Centaur
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Kdaai Fireborn
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Fear, Bound Fire Deamon.

unit.name: Hobgoblin Spear Chukka
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Hobgoblin Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Bolt Thrower, Greenskins.

unit.name: Deathshrieker Rocket
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Chaos Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Deathshrieker Rocket.

unit.name: Rabble
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and shield. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Greenskins.

unit.name: Orc Slave
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon, light armour and shield. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Anti-Cav (spear), Greenskins.

unit.name: Black Orc Slave
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Expendable, Minions, Greenskins.

unit.name: Bull Centaur Render
unit.description: Equipment: Hand Weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Fear.

unit.name: Whirlwind/Tenderiser
unit.description: Equipment: Heavy armour, pavise and flayer, Special Rules: Fear, Flayer

unit.name: Dreadquake Mortar
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Chaos Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Dreadquake Mortar.

unit.name: Magma Cannon
unit.description: Warmachine: 3 Chaos Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Magma Cannon.

unit.name: Hellcannon
unit.description: Hellcannon Warmachine: 1 Helldaemon and 3 Chaos Dwarf Crew. Equipment: Hand weapon. The Chaos Dwarf Crew wear heavy armour. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Immune to Psychology, Hellcannon.

unit.name: Chaos Giant
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Stubborn, Immune to Panic, Large Target, Giant.

unit.name: Kdaai Destroyer
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Terror, Large Target, Frenzy, Bound Fire Deamon.

mount.name: Wolf
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Lammasu
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, MR (2).

mount.name: Great Taurus
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Flying Model, Large Target, Terror, Scaly Skin (4+), Blazing Breath.

item.name: Amulet of Hashut
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Arcane Apparatus
item.description: The bearer gains +1A. In addition the bearer gets +1 to cast (BM and PM).

item.name: Armour of Devious Fate
item.description: Light armour, models that attack the bearer in cc must re-roll successful to-hit rolls.

item.name: Armour of Gazrakh
item.description: Armour that grants an AS of 1+ that may not be improved.

item.name: Armour of Stone
item.description: Chaos Armour, +1T

item.name: Armour of the Furnace
item.description: Chaos Armour, bearer is immune to effects of Poisoned Attacks and Killing Blow

item.name: Axe of Ghorth
item.description: All hits automatically wound. AS modification as per strength of the bearer.

item.name: BM Ash Storm
item.description: (8+) Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Breath of Hatred
item.description: (5+) Augment, Range 18", target unit gains Hatred. Remains in Play.

item.name: BM Burning Wrath
item.description: (7+) MM, Range 18", D6 S5 hits

item.name: BM Dark Subjugation
item.description: (9+) Hex, Range 24", target unit must pass a Ld test at - 3 or it gets a Subjugation marker. For each marker the unit suffers a -1 modifier on all Ld based tests. Has no effect on character models. But a unit with Subjugation markers using the Ld of a character would still suffer the penalty.

item.name: BM Flames of Asgorh
item.description: (8+) Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S4 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S4 hits.

item.name: BM Hell Hammer
item.description: (9+) MM, Range 24", 1 hit like bolt thrower (S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks)

item.name: Banner of Daemonic Tides
item.description: Unit gains +1M.

item.name: Banner of Obedience
item.description: The unit does not suffer from Animosity, i.e. the unit automatically passes the roll.

item.name: Banner of Slavery
item.description: Units with the Minions special rule within 12" reroll failed psychology tests.

item.name: Black Gem of Gnar
item.description: Use at the start of any close combat round (timing step 1) after challenges have been declared and accepted. Choose a single model in btb with the bearer. The bearer and this model as well as their mounts may not attack this combat round. One use only.

item.name: Black Standard of Zharr-Naggrund
Black Standard of Zharr-N.
item.description: The bearer and unit gain a Ward Save (5+). Has no effect on (other) character models in the unit.

item.name: Blades of Backstabbing
item.description: Count as additional hand weapons and grant +1S. Models on foot only.

item.name: Blaze of Hashut PM 2/5+
Blaze of Hashut PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", unit gets Poisoned Attacks (1) in cc, until the casters next magic phase. If the unit already has Poisoned Attacks, increase its value by +1. Has no effect on magic items.

item.name: Blazing Breath
item.description: Breath weapon, S4

item.name: Blunderbuss
item.description: This ranged weapon has two fire modes (see below). - The power of hits in both fire modes depends on the formation of the unit and whether it remained stationary or not. If the unit didnt move in the movement phase then the power of each shot is increased for each rank of 5+ models behind the front rank, otherwise use the basic power value: - basic S3, AP(1) - 1 rank S4 - 2 ranks S4, AP(1) - 3+ ranks S5 - Single Shot: Range 15", no penalty for moving and shooting. In addition to the other limitations for boosting shots, the unit may only boost the power of Single Shots if only the front rank of the unit is firing, i.e. if the unit likes to shoot with more ranks (for example if they are positioned on a hill or shooting at a Large Target) they have to use the basic power value. - Annihilation Volley: Alternate fire mode that can be used by the unit instead of each model shooting individually. - To use this fire mode the unit has to be at least 5 models wide (character models count as armed with a Blunderbuss for this purpose). - Pick a unit within LOS of at least 5 models of the front rank as the target unit. - Place the center of the 3" template (anywhere) over the target unit. - If the template is completely within 15" then roll to hit using the template rules. Models that are not part of the target unit can only be hit if the shooting unit has LOS to them. - This mode cannot be used to Stand & Shoot.

item.name: Bound Fire Daemon
item.description: - Daemonic Ward Save (5+) - Magical Attacks - Immune to Psychology - This unit cannot be joined by character models - Bound Daemon: At the start of each turn where there is no Daemonsmith left in the army, this unit suffers D3 wounds with no saves allowed (allocated like ranged attacks). - Instability: When a daemonic unit loses combat it has to take a break test with the following exceptions: - Flux Disruption: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is equal to or less than the leadership of the unit, it suffers a number of wounds equal to the amount it failed the test by (no saves of any kind allowed). - Warp Collapse: If the unit fails to pass its break test and the roll is higher than the leadership of the unit, it is destroyed. Note: Bound Daemons only benefit from Inspiring Presence and Hold Your Ground! if the general or the BSB respectively has the Daemonsmith special rule.

item.name: Bull Horn of Uzkulak
item.description: PM2/5+. Automatically rally all friendly broken units.

item.name: Chalice of Darkness
item.description: At the start of any magic phase, after rolling for the winds of magic, you may roll a D6: 1 you lose one dice from your magic pool, 2-5 your opponent loses one dice from his magic pool, 6 both players lose one dice form their magic pools.

item.name: Champion: Pistol
item.description: 8", S4, AP(1), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always stand and shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance. Multiple shots (2) for brace of pistols.

item.name: Chaos Armour
item.description: 4+ AS

item.name: Crooked Dice
item.description: After deployment the bearer gets D3 rerolls, that can each be used to reroll one failed to-hit, to-wound or saving throw of this model. One use only.

item.name: Cutthroats
item.description: If this unit is fighting in the flank or rear of a unit, any model with this special rule gets +1 to its to-hit rolls. This benefit does not apply against units that ignore the combat resolution bonus for being flanked or attacked at the rear, like Beasts of Nurgle for example.

item.name: Daemonsmith
item.description: - Immune to Psychology - Infernal Engineer: If this model is within 3" of a warmachine that suffers a misfire and the player chooses the option Ignore, he may add +1 to the roll. Cannot be used if this model is engaged in cc. - Sorcerers Curse: The first time this model suffers a miscast in the game do not roll on the miscast table, instead the model automatically suffers the 1-2 result. If the model survives it gains +1 T. (this only applies for the first miscast of the model, i.e. once per game)

item.name: Dark Lands Standard
item.description: The unit loses the Light Infantry special rule.

item.name: Dark Mace of Death
item.description: causes D3 wounds, Killing Blow

item.name: Deamonshrieker
item.description: The bearer causes Terror.

item.name: Deathshrieker Rocket
item.description: Range 12”-60”, 3” Template, S4(8), no AS, D3 wounds, units that suffer one or more casualties must pass a panic test. To shoot with this warmachine, use the cannon rules but there is no bounce. Instead, the template is placed with the hole at the point of impact and is then resolved. Also, any point in front of the target unit may be targeted, i.e. there is no minimum distance for the target point to the target unit. This warmachine has no Grapeshot mode.

item.name: Despoiler Standard
item.description: If this unit has the Light Cavalry special rule it may start the game in reserve. Beginning with turn 2, roll a d6 at the start of your turn: on a 4+ the unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit), add +1 to the roll for each turn after the second, a natural 1 always fails.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS

item.name: Ensorcelled Weapon
item.description: hand weapon that grants +1S and magical attacks

item.name: Expendable
item.description: This unit does not cause panic in friendly units, unless they are Expendable themselves

item.name: Fire Shield
item.description: Shield, models attacking the bearer in cc suffer -1 to their tohit roll.

item.name: Fireglaive
item.description: Range 18", S4, AP(1), counts as a halberd in cc

item.name: Flayer
item.description: Instead of attacking normally in close combat, the model inflicts a number of hits equal to an Artillery Dice at S4 to one unit in its front (Chaos Dwarf players choice), distribute like impact hits. In addition, the model is -1 to hit in cc. Misfire: model suffers 1 wound which counts for combat resolution.

item.name: Gauntlets of Bazhrakk the Cruel
Gauntlets of Bazhrakk t. C.
item.description: +1S, for any to-hit roll of a natural 1 in cc, a friendly model in btb contact with the bearer suffers the hit, if the model is mounted the hit may also hit its mount. All hits suffered this way are allocated like shooting.

item.name: Greenskins
item.description: Models in this unit count as Greenskins (has no direct effect).

item.name: Hell Armour
item.description: Chaos Armour, Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Inflammation PM 2/7+
Inflammation PM 3/7+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", target unit with the Bound Fire Daemon special rule regains (heals) 1W but no additional models can be created.

item.name: Magma Cannon
item.description: Flamer Weapon, 12” Range, S5, AP(1), D3 wounds, units that suffer one or more casualties must pass a panic test.

item.name: Minions
item.description: - Animosity: In the Start of the Turn phase roll a D6 if the unit has a US of at least 5 and is not engaged in combat or broken. On a roll of a 1 the unit may not declare a charge or move in this turns movement phase and it may not shoot in this turns shooting phase. - This unit can only be joined by character models with the Minions special rule.

item.name: Obsidian Blade
item.description: no AS, in addition each model hit loses its armour and shield (may destroy magic armour but has no effect on barding, Scaly Skin, etc.)

item.name: Pendant of Uzkulak
item.description: The bearer may reroll one failed to-hit, to-wound or saving throw. One use only.

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Relentless
item.description: This unit can march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Rubic of Daemonic Whispers
Rubic of Daem. Whispers
item.description: Enemy units within 12" of the bearer have to reveal all magic items in the unit (incl. character models).

item.name: Shard of the Furnace
item.description: Ward Save (2+) vs attacks with the Poisoned Attacks special rule

item.name: Shield of Wariness
item.description: Shield, a single model in btb loses 1A until the end of the combat round, declare at the start of each combat round which model and which attack.

item.name: Shields for bows
item.description: W Bow: 24", S3

item.name: Shroud of Darkness PM 2/5+
Shroud of Darkness PM 3/5+
item.description: Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models.

item.name: Spy Banner
item.description: The unit gains the Scouts special rule.

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Stone Totem of Zhoghar
item.description: Unit gains MR (2).

item.name: Talisman of Eternal Servitude
item.description: When the bearer loses its last wound roll a D6: on a 2+ the model is not killed and survives with 1 wound. One use only.

item.name: Talisman of Obsidian
item.description: MR (2), bearer and any model in btb may not cast spells

item.name: Taskmaster
item.description: Units within 6" of this model may reroll failed Animosity tests. This special rule cannot be used if this model is broken.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: Whip of Domination
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons and grants ASF.

item.name: Yeoman Craftsman
item.description: Counts as unit champion
